name: MySqlDumper
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: MySQLDumper is a free PHP/Perl script to backup your important MySQL-Data safe and secure and restore them in the case of an emergency.

matches.text: align="center">The execution of SQL Statements can manipulate data. TAKE CARE! The Authors don't accept any liability for damaged or lost data.
